projectDescription: ITEWE is a company profile and product catalog website for a business that sells construction equipment and materials. This web application allows users to browse various products, view detailed descriptions, and learn more about the company. Built with React, Tailwind CSS, and JavaScript, the platform provides a comprehensive online presence for ITEWE.

features.featureDescription: Ensures a seamless browsing experience across all devices making it easy for users to access information anytime and anywhere.
Provides comprehensive information about the company's history, mission, and values.
Displays the company's accomplishments and milestones to build trust and credibility.
Features a wide range of products from various brands, organized for easy browsing.
Allows users to download detailed product specifications and information in PDF format.

projectDescription: Backoffice Mall Taman Anggrek is an internal web application designed to manage the operations of Mall Taman Anggrek efficiently. It features user authentication and authorization, along with modules for managing customers, tenants, memberships, promotions, events, and content for the mall’s member application. Built with Next.js, TypeScript, and Material UI, the system provides a structured, fast, and user-friendly experience for mall administrators.

features.featureDescription: Secure login system with multi-factor authentication to protect sensitive mall operations data and ensure only authorized personnel can access the system.
Role-based access control system that defines different permission levels for various user types, ensuring staff can only access features relevant to their responsibilities.
Comprehensive Create, Read, Update, and Delete functionality across all modules, allowing administrators to efficiently manage all mall data including customers, tenants, events, and promotions.
Real-time monitoring system for customer purchases and redemptions, providing administrators with detailed insights into shopping patterns and program effectiveness.
Advanced system to manage loyalty points, vouchers, and special offers, with automated tracking of reward issuance, usage, and expiration to enhance the customer loyalty program.
Flexible tools for creating and publishing dynamic content including banners, event announcements, promotions, and mall information across customer-facing applications.
Customizable reporting engine that produces detailed analytics on mall operations, customer demographics, transaction patterns, and campaign effectiveness to support data-driven decision making.

projectDescription: Mall Taman Anggrek Customer App is a mobile-first progressive web application designed to enhance the shopping experience at Mall Taman Anggrek. The app serves as a digital loyalty platform where customers can register, track their purchases, earn and redeem points, receive personalized promotions, and stay updated with the latest mall events and offers. Built with Next.js and optimized for performance across all devices, this PWA provides shoppers with a seamless connection to the mall's ecosystem while offering valuable insights to mall management through customer engagement data.

features.featureDescription: Versatile authentication system allowing customers to access their accounts through email, google accounts, or phone number verification, providing convenience while maintaining security.
App-like experience accessible directly from web browsers, featuring offline functionality, fast loading speeds, and the ability to install on home screens without requiring app store downloads.
Alert system that keeps customers informed about exclusive mall events, personalized offers, points expiration, and special promotions through in-app and push notifications.
Customizable personal dashboard where customers can manage their membership details, view loyalty points, update personal information, and set communication preferences.
Comprehensive system allowing customers to monitor their shopping history, track loyalty points earned, view receipt details, and manage vouchers and rewards all in one convenient location.

projectDescription: The Mall Taman Anggrek Tenant App is a specialized web application designed for tenants to streamline their operational workflows. It provides a secure portal for tenants to manage their store profiles, submit sales data, track performance metrics, and communicate directly with mall management. Key features include a comprehensive dashboard for real-time sales monitoring, tools for participating in mall-wide promotions and events, and a notification system for important updates. Built with Next.js and integrated with the mall’s central backoffice system, the app empowers tenants to optimize their operations and enhance their partnership with Mall Taman Anggrek.

features.featureDescription: Secure login system to ensure that only authorized tenant staff can access the application, protecting sensitive sales and operational data.
A comprehensive dashboard that provides tenants with real-time insights into their sales performance, customer engagement, and operational metrics, enabling data-driven decision making.
Allows tenants to manage their store profiles, update contact information, and customize their settings for a personalized experience.
Enables tenants to view and participate in mall-wide promotions and events, helping them to increase visibility and drive sales.
A system for managing customer redemptions, allowing tenants to track and process loyalty points and rewards efficiently.
Notifications for important updates, new campaigns, and operational alerts to keep tenants informed and engaged.
Tenant administrators can manage user accounts, assign roles, and control access to various features within the application.

projectDescription: MLD Member is a loyalty program web application that offers exclusive benefits to its members. The platform allows users to register, earn points from purchases, and redeem them for rewards. It features a personalized dashboard where members can track their points, view their transaction history, and access special promotions. The application is designed to foster a strong community by providing a seamless and engaging experience for all MLD members.

features.featureDescription: Secure login and registration system to ensure that only authorized members can access the application, protecting their personal data and points.
A comprehensive system for members to earn, track, and redeem points for various rewards, enhancing member engagement and loyalty.
Allows members to view and register for exclusive events, fostering a sense of community and providing additional value to the membership.
An easy-to-use interface for members to browse and redeem their accumulated points for a variety of rewards, including merchandise, vouchers, and exclusive experiences.
A mobile-friendly application that provides a seamless user experience across devices, allowing members to access their accounts and rewards anytime, anywhere.

projectDescription: Skillku is a web application designed to help users learn new skills through interactive courses and tutorials. The platform offers a wide range of topics, allowing users to explore various fields and enhance their knowledge. Built with Next.js, Tailwind CSS, and React, Skillku provides a modern and responsive design that ensures an engaging learning experience.

features.featureDescription: A comprehensive library of courses covering various topics, allowing users to easily find and enroll in courses that interest them.
Engaging course materials including videos, quizzes, and interactive exercises to enhance the learning experience.
Personalized user profiles where learners can track their progress, manage enrolled courses, and view completed lessons.
A modern and responsive design that ensures a seamless learning experience across all devices, from desktops to mobile phones.
Advanced search and filtering options to help users quickly find courses based on their interests, skill levels, and categories.

projectDescription: Beverindo Indah Abadi is a company profile and product catalog website for a business that specializes in beverage distribution. This web application allows users to learn about the company, its history, and the products it offers. Built with Laravel, PHP, Tailwind CSS, and JavaScript, the platform provides a modern and responsive design that enhances user experience.

features.featureDescription: Ensures a seamless browsing experience across all devices, making it easy for users to access information anytime and anywhere.
Enhances user experience with smooth transitions and animations, making navigation more engaging and visually appealing.
Provides comprehensive information about the company's history, mission, and values.
Features a wide range of products offered by the company, organized for easy browsing.
Displays contact details and a contact form for inquiries, enhancing customer engagement.

projectDescription: This project is a comprehensive e-commerce platform for Rumahku, a company specializing in a wide range of household products, including electronics, kitchenware, bedroom furniture, and more. Built using Next.js, Tailwind CSS, and React, the platform is designed to provide a seamless shopping experience. Key features include a robust authentication system, advanced product search with filtering options, a dynamic blog page, a dedicated user profile section, and a convenient order tracking system, among many other functionalities.

features.featureDescription: Users can securely sign up, log in, and manage their account details
Customers can easily find what they are looking for by filtering products based on various criteria
The platform includes a blog section with dynamic content to engage users with relevant articles and updates
Customers can track the real-time status and location of their purchases from the moment they are ordered until delivery
The shopping cart allows users to collect products before proceeding to the checkout process
Users can save products they are interested in buying later to their personal wishlist
Customers can leave ratings and written reviews to share their experience with products
The system supports multiple secure payment options, such as credit cards and digital wallets
The platform enables the use of coupon codes and discounts during the checkout process to attract and retain customers
The website is optimized to look and function perfectly on various devices, including desktops, tablets, and mobile phones

projectDescription: Project YAVA is a company profile website built with Next.js, Tailwind CSS, and React. The main objective is to showcase YAVA, a company specializing in nut-based snacks. The website features essential pages, including a Home page for an overview, a detailed Product Listing page with a search function, and dedicated sections for Ingredients, Company information, a Blog, and Customer Reviews. The modern technology stack ensures the site is fast, responsive, and visually appealing, providing a seamless user experience.

features.featureDescription: This feature displays a comprehensive list of all the snacks offered by YAVA
This functionality allows users to quickly find specific products using keywords
This section provides detailed information about the ingredients used in each product
This page offers a detailed look into YAVA's history, mission, and values
This feature contains articles and updates related to the company, products, and healthy eating
This page showcases testimonials and feedback from customers about their experience with YAVA's snacks
This feature makes the website accessible to a wider global audience by providing multiple language options
This functionality adds dynamic and engaging visual effects to enhance the overall user experience
This ensures the website provides an optimal viewing experience on various devices, from desktops to mobile phones
